review: We had a pleasant time here. Fascinating place. The food is very tasty. A good restaurant that we experienced during our trip to Sri Lanka. Love it. Recommend to everyone.

Amazing restaurant and even more amazing staff !!!
The food is soooo good and you will be greeted with such warmth.
Go try it out you will be pleased !
:)

We had the pleasure of spending a morning with Srilankan Mama at one of her famous cookery classes. Srilankan Mama and her family were all extremely friendly throughout our visit. We felt like honoured guests rather than just paying customers. We made a delicious lunch...(about 8 or so different dishes and sides, all vegetarian), all made from scratch, and would thoroughly recommend this to anyone staying in the Ella area. Just 10/15 minutes by tuk tuk from the Main Street in Ella and such good value. TIP - Don’t eat too much food for breakfast though as you will cook a lot of super tasty food during your cla (about 8 or so different dishes and sides, all vegetarian), all made from scratch, and would thoroughly recommend this to anyone staying in the Ella area. Just 10/15 minutes by tuk tuk from the Main Street in Ella and such good value. TIP - Don’t eat too much food for breakfast though as you will cook a lot of super tasty food during your class.

To say we LOVE this place is an understatement. We’ve been twice for dinner during our stay on Ella and we joined their cooking class - the food is that good!
They offer a very large selection of curries and other local dishes, wonderfully friendly...owners and a quiet intimate setting away from the Main Street. It’s definitely worth the tuk-tuk ride to come here. We highly recommend and hope to have the chance to come ba owners and a quiet intimate setting away from the Main Street. It’s definitely worth the tuk-tuk ride to come here. We highly recommend and hope to have the chance to come back!

Not only the curries but also the bread and the whole food experience was astonishing!
I really like the welcoming hosts and they checked in with us and chatted with us!

Loved it!

My girlfriends and I were amazed by this lovely family and the delicious food!! It’s a must on your stay in Ella to eat there and chat with them. They also offer cooking classes which looked really good as well. Definitely worth it if you...want local food and way better choice than the restaurants directly in E want local food and way better choice than the restaurants directly in Ella

A real gem, a little bit hidden but once your in its amazing, prices are real cheap the people are lovely the food is great you can taste that everything is fresh and just amazing. Just go and start enjoying

We were planning on having dinner but decided to do the cooking course as well. It was fantastic! We learned how to make ~8 curries, coconut roti and papadums. Food was great and the family was very friendly. I burned my finger (my fault) and...they gave me fresh Aloe Vera from their garden.  I highly recommend The Kitchen Garden for a meal or cooking less they gave me fresh Aloe Vera from their garden.  I highly recommend The Kitchen Garden for a meal or cooking lesson.
Absolutely delicious food, best fresh vegetable dishes, generous portions at a ver good rate, so tasty and great hosts. A real home cooked feel.

We went there for dinner: It was amazing! Best food all of us had so far in sri lanka and really lovely owners ♡ beautiful place 
(We had the yellow rice)

We visited this restaurant twice in a two night visit to Ella. We first went for dinner and then booked onto the cooking class.

Mama (head chef) was so lovely and kept the kitchen running on full steam. The right hand man was also so...lovely. 

The aubergine curry was my favourite and the pumpkin was amazing as was the chicken, well actually all of the food was stunning, they even got me liking beetroot!

I miss this pla lovely. 

The aubergine curry was my favourite and the pumpkin was amazing as was the chicken, well actually all of the food was stunning, they even got me liking beetroot!

I miss this place!

We had an amazing lunch for my boyfriends birthday. The restaurant setting is beautiful, very rustic and overlooking rice field and gardens. The lady who runs the restaurant is so warm and friendly - all the staff were amazing. There was a cooking class going...on which looked very fun and we wish we had the time to do. We had a huge array of traditional dishes - they were all absolutely delicious. Definitely the best authentic meal we have had on our trip. They made it so special for us and my boyfriends birthday and we will never forget the experience. Thank you so much  on which looked very fun and we wish we had the time to do. We had a huge array of traditional dishes - they were all absolutely delicious. Definitely the best authentic meal we have had on our trip. They made it so special for us and my boyfriends birthday and we will never forget the experience. Thank you so much :-)

This is a really nice place to eat Sri Lanka food. It’s run by a really nice couple. They grow the veggies in their garden so it’s very fresh and organic. Prices are very reasonable and there was so much food. They also offer cooking...class classes.

I have done numerous cooking classes in different countries and this was up there with the best. Srilankan Mama is such a lovey lady who is so experienced in the kitchen. She learned from her mama and has years of experience. Everything tasted so amazing...and we were able to take photos of the recipes to recreate them at home, which I definitely will. I would recommend the restaurant if that’s the quality of the food, so tasty and freshly grown on their own land! THANK YO and we were able to take photos of the recipes to recreate them at home, which I definitely will. I would recommend the restaurant if that’s the quality of the food, so tasty and freshly grown on their own land! THANK YOU x

Best cooking experience in Sri Lanka!
Highly recommended! 
My husband and I came to the Kitchen Garden to learn how to prepare tasty Sri Lankan food and we are so happy because it was an unforgettable experience. 
This is a family farm/restaurant/cooking class place where...you can enjoy while Swarna, the best chef and our teacher, explains very well how to cook rice and curry. 
We really appreciated the welcoming, the explanation during the cooking class, the details, their farm, the view and most important, their efforts to share their knowledge about local food. They received us with a cup of tea before the cooking class.
The whole team is very kind and always with a big smile.
Even the music during our class was so nice that we danced while cooking! 🎉 Also, they prepared us a tasty fresh juice with papaya, banana, pineapple and mango during our class.
All ingredients are fresh and Swarna takes her time to teach, she is very patient and she loves what she does!!!
Many thanks aga you can enjoy while Swarna, the best chef and our teacher, explains very well how to cook rice and curry. 
We really appreciated the welcoming, the explanation during the cooking class, the details, their farm, the view and most important, their efforts to share their knowledge about local food. They received us with a cup of tea before the cooking class.
The whole team is very kind and always with a big smile.
Even the music during our class was so nice that we danced while cooking! 🎉 Also, they prepared us a tasty fresh juice with papaya, banana, pineapple and mango during our class.
All ingredients are fresh and Swarna takes her time to teach, she is very patient and she loves what she does!!!
Many thanks again!

Below par food here, the worst meal we have had in SL. Roti was ok
Rice and curry could have been made by anyone. 
Not terrible, but not good
Note lots of reviews by people who have only ever done one reviwe

this place is located right outside the trail to little adam's peak, saw good review and decided to give it a try. food wise i thought it was okay, worth a try but certainly not the best rice and curry i have eaten, ambience of...the place though, it's great! it is spacious and feels very comfortable to relax there after lunch while waiting for the train schedule at 9 arch bri the place though, it's great! it is spacious and feels very comfortable to relax there after lunch while waiting for the train schedule at 9 arch bridge
The view is nice far away 100% touristy places in Ella. The staff is so helpful and the kottu roti is crazy tasty ! Plus : 5min from the road to 9 arches bridge.
I had a very good lunch here. Food was very good, very relaxing atmosphere. Very friendly helpful staff.
We went on a rainy day, and were pleasantly surprised by the delicious rice and curry cooked by the owner! Good variety and generous portions. Try it!

Was taken here after my tour of Nine Arch Bridge and had a delicious and super filling Sri Lankan Curry for SLR400 (with a freshly squeezed passion fruit juice
For SLR300) which is much less than the same meal in Ella town. The location is...nice with a view of the Little Adam’s Peak with nearby trees full of chipmunks and birds.

My only criticism is that the house music was a little loud for lunchtime, but other than that I can highly recommend a vis nice with a view of the Little Adam’s Peak with nearby trees full of chipmunks and birds.

My only criticism is that the house music was a little loud for lunchtime, but other than that I can highly recommend a visit!
Great food, The fruit Roti was amazing !  Fantastic value for money and nice view. Service was excellent from Adam 😎

cheese & vegetable koththu was tasty! portion was big, good price performance.
also very nice view. :)
This place was epic! So much food for such a cheap price! And the passion fruit juice was out of this world.. would highly recommend for lunch. To get out of the expensive hotel prices
Excellent vegetable soup that warmed us up on such a rainy day! Friendly service too! Parking on the road outside Adam’s Breeze.

We ate here during our stay in Ella and had a delicious dinner. Don’t let the look of the place deter you, the food was tasty and plentiful. We had the Sri Lankan curry and it was a real feast with plenty of sides and...tasty chicken curry.

Service was good and views were pleasant. Definitely worth a look if you want some tasty, authentic fo tasty chicken curry.

Service was good and views were pleasant. Definitely worth a look if you want some tasty, authentic food.

If your looking for tasty local food - this place is a must. A simple eatery with really friendly locals who cook everything fresh. Service is really nice. Highly recommended after climbing little Adams peak or after doing the zip line / quad bike. I...loved the egg roti with a cup of coffee!! Their vegetable rolls and chicken rolls are a must t loved the egg roti with a cup of coffee!! Their vegetable rolls and chicken rolls are a must too!

Good meal. Great service, excellent value, nice location.

Had chicken noodles and egg kotthu and a tomato salad. Kotthu was really  very nice, noodles were ok- chicken had been chopped up in a way which meant there were bit of bones in the chicken which...wasn’t nice.

Would eat here again but avoid the chicke wasn’t nice.

Would eat here again but avoid the chicken..
Staff was so lovely and helped us with recommendations of different dishes. The portions were huge and the vegetable spring rolls were the best I’ve ever had!!

I visited this place very late, with friends, there was no problem eating fresh and delicious dinner, we also came back to eat lunch another day, great place, service and location, one of the best rice and curry in Sri Lanka :)
Food was delicious, so cozy to sit and unwind, staff was very attentive and so welcoming especially Shan. We will come back :)
This was a great place to get drinks before dinner! Shan was super nice and very attentive. As a group of girls we had a lot of fun at One Love :)
Highly recommend Cafe one love. Food and drinks were excellent and the vibes were immaculate. Shan took care of us and made us feel like when you’re here, you’re family.
Amazing spot for drinks and hookah. Chill vibes, could spend all day here drinking on one of their bean bags. Shan was excellent
This place had pretty solid appetizers and the vibes here are simply great. Our server Shan was awesome and really helped make our experience. Love him
Amazing place with amazing staff. Thanks to Ashi for all the help. Defenitely you should visit this llace when in Ella 🙂
Amazing vibes in Cafe. Food was to 10 on 10. Ashi had been really helpful, cheerful, wonderful & welcoming hostess. Thanks for a great time!
Ashi , she was nice service and we had a good time with friends . She was so lovely and we will coming back to see her again !! Thank you so much !
We had good time with good serverve from Ashi . Food was good too .we recommend here and to see lovely woman ! you will love it here
Good service from Shan, comfortable seating and lovely vibes! Nice place to unwind after a long walk to Ella Rock!!!!!!

Super place in Ella 
3th floor with nice view and fantastic interior.
After some long hikes the place to be to chill.
Super drinks and bites.
Super friendly people and Neelaka offers the best cocktails.👍🤪🙏
The view was very beautiful and de atmosphere was very nice. Ashi was very nice and helpful and everything was great!!!!
We had delicious drinks and very good food. Thank you for your nice service Shan. It’s a really cool location with good music!

Only had a few cocktails (no food). Lovely pineapple mojito. Was keen to try mango but no available. Beautiful vistas and the decor is very boho and trendy. Can imagine it being lively and happening at night with a young crowd. Marked it down a...bit as advice started okay but got very slow, even though it still wasn’t busy by the time I left. Definitely worth a visit but I can’t compare to other venues nearby as had no time to try/compa bit as advice started okay but got very slow, even though it still wasn’t busy by the time I left. Definitely worth a visit but I can’t compare to other venues nearby as had no time to try/compare.

Food is very tasty and super friendly stuff!! :) 
The falafelwrap and bruschetta are highly recommended. Definitely a good experience for lunch!
Good food and drinks. We went to the dream cafe twice during our stay in Ella because of the lovely Chandika who was very friendly. Would recommend :)
Eat there the fried Noodles. It was really basic, just ok. Service was stressful because they want close the kitchen soon.
Superb place,food are also good and tasty.I think they use natural spices as well.I recomend the place.

We went here on New Years Eve. Service was prompt and good. Servers were alert about the tables and quick to ask if anything was required. Only the drinks were not too good. Food was great and portions very adequate.
Great bar restaurant.  Good food including lots of western choice. The waiter Ramesh is the best, he provides excellent service.
Great place to eat, we where here for diner. Most amazing pizza in town! And the best service from Ramesh.  Good food and reasonable price.

My waiter Ramesh was very welcoming and efficient. There was a power outage so no wifi. He generously offered me a hotspot to his phone. The cafe's food is a good standard and well-priced. They also play soothing music. A nice spot for the discerning...travell traveller.

This spot is great either you go for breakfast, lunch or you for something to drink. The staff is very friendly, serviceminded. Ramesh, one of the waiters, was always responding quick and nice. I absolutely recommend this place!

We’ve been at Dream Cafe tonight for the first time. The food and cocktails were great.  We also really liked the possibility to eat delicious Sri Lankan cuisine next to western food. The staff was very kind as well. Highly recommended!
Best pizza’s in town with very nice waiter rames, he was very helpfull and kind. He had good recommendations and good cocktails.

There’s a great vibe in Ella and this is a great place to go. We ate Sri Lankan - really yum food and cheap! Wine was good and all drinks very cold. You get a great selection even ordering curry and rice (eg several curries...with Dahl and Sam Al and papadams) great setvice al with Dahl and Sam Al and papadams) great setvice also.
We had an amazing breakfast here. The Sri Lankan breakfast and the fruit platter were both generous portions and delicious. Our waiter, Ramesh was fantastic! Highly recommend visiting here.

We had pina colada and passion mojito. Both were great! 
We had potato wedges for a snack.
Chandika gave us the best service. Thank you man!
Very nice food! Amazing place! Chandika wea the best weither!!!! Good experience ❤️❤️❤️ if you in ella you should come

The waiter Chandika was very friendly. He makes for us a very special shisha and drinks. We had some nice konversations with him.
All in all was a very nice location with good music.
Such a great, tasty meal! We had rice and curry of the day, and were so happy with it. A bit spicy (could have been spicier for us.) Very welcoming staff.
Great vibe. Fab food and cocktails. Best rice and curry we had on our holidays! Mid rage prices. Would definitely return.
Best food of the trip! We loved the lump rice,  the kottu and the delicious cocktails. The staff are super friendly and the restaurant has a great atmosphere.

Vary good food. Very good value for money. Also good relaxing music and friendly staff.  Chama was very good and told us to try the lump rice which was really excellent. We stayed in Ella 2 days and we ate here 3 times dinner and...breakfast. Highly recommend breakfast. Highly recommended.

This is such a cool little place, the people who own/run it are beautiful, so kind and will do anything for you. The atmosphere is so chilled and it makes you feel like you could be anywhere in the world. The food is amazing, so...delicious! A nice little escape from the busy stree delicious! A nice little escape from the busy street 🙏
Very nice place with delicious food. We tried rice and curry and kottu roti and trully we can recommend these food. The waiters were also very nice and helpfull
Great food. Well prepared and presented and appropriately priced. Courteous staff. Quirky, authentic decor. Relaxing.
Great food, ambience and service! Cool place off the beaten track with some of Ella's most competitive prices.
Cafe Samsara is a really cosy place. If you want to find good local food, go there. The lumb rice was delicious!
We had a really good time here. The staff is very nice and helpful, they even helped us get train tickets. The location is super cute and the food was amazing. We can highly recommend this place!

Food over rated.
Service was very poor.
Took 1hr 20min for 5 meals. Very damn slow. The waiters are poor responsive.
And very bad experience with bill payment

Great service and great atmosphere. The servers were really friendly and got me my drink just the way I wanted. We had great conversations and they will help you plan out the details of your journey if you don’t know where to go. The food...was good. The servers named Sugala and Chamith kept us company. A true hidden gem in Ella! Want a chilled time go there! They are open till late nig was good. The servers named Sugala and Chamith kept us company. A true hidden gem in Ella! Want a chilled time go there! They are open till late night.

Amazing place to go for delicious food. We had the  lumprice, it was so tasty - delicious curries and very large portion cooked fresh in a banana leaf. Cool venue set in a treehouse and service was brilliant. 10/10 would recommend

This was the best meal I’ve had in Sri Lanka (and up there with some of the best meals of my life). The lump rice is INSANE!!! So many textures, so much flavour!!! I also had the mixed juice which was also delicious! I wish...I’d discovered this restaurant sooner. Staff lovely, reasonable prices and great location just off the Main Street. You’ve got to visit here if you’re in Ella I’d discovered this restaurant sooner. Staff lovely, reasonable prices and great location just off the Main Street. You’ve got to visit here if you’re in Ella!!!
If you need a hide away from the busy road, get a break at this place in one of the side streets, roof-top, far away from busy life. Cool guys, cool atmosphere and decoration.

Unfortunately our experience was not good. Went there on friday 1st march. We ordered a drink, cheese toastie, and a sri lankan main meal. It was a quiet evening and apart from us, there was just one other couple dining. 

Our drink and cheese toastie...arrived, then we waited. And waited and waited. After 45min of waiting, we asked the waiter where our food is. He looked surprised, and said we only ordered a drink and toastie! God knows why he didn’t ask us during the 45min if we wanted anything!

When I reminded him what we ordered he checked and it turns out that he forgot to place the order! Quite the surprise as there was barely anyone else dining. 

There were many ants walking around the floor too. Not sure what all the positive reviews are all abo arrived, then we waited. And waited and waited. God knows why he didn’t ask us during the 45min if we wanted anything!

There were many ants walking around the floor too. Not sure what all the positive reviews are all about.

We ate here for lunch because the reviews were great. I can only agree with the reviews. The food is fresh and tasty and the coffee is great at a reasonable price. The staff are very helpful and friendly.
I highly recommend having drinks and...food he food here.

Super small quiet restaurant just a short walk away from bustle of Main Street in Ella. Very good welcome and service. Excellent passion fruit mojito, lime mojito, the crushed ice is made with bottled water. Good choice meals. We had pumpkin soup with garlic bread...which was really nice. Then battered prawns which were really big moment of them, prawn and egg kottu which was delicious, rice and curry, very nice and chicken pizza, all freshly cooked to order. Including drinks and two courses for 4 people whole thing only came to about £30. Really clean place highly recommend. Wi-Fi fr which was really nice. Then battered prawns which were really big moment of them, prawn and egg kottu which was delicious, rice and curry, very nice and chicken pizza, all freshly cooked to order. Including drinks and two courses for 4 people whole thing only came to about £30. Really clean place highly recommend. Wi-Fi free.
Super restaurant! We spent here a good time! ;) Good Wi-Fi connection. Nice place. It is quite far away from Cetrum of Ella what we appreciated. Thank you Tereza & Monika

We were so lucky to have found this little gem in Ella. The best curry we had was here! And also the sandwiches and fresh icetea's and warm cinnamon tea where great! The staff is very friendly and will do their best to serve you....They also have a very clean toilet. Our compliments to the chef! Do not miss this little cafe when staying in El They also have a very clean toilet. Our compliments to the chef! Do not miss this little cafe when staying in Ella!

A nice little restaurant in Ella, simple settings but clean. Staff were attentive, helpful and service was excellent. The menu included a good variety of vegetarian dishes too. I had the Crispy mushroom burger (as I fancied a balance to the traditional curry). In terms...of presentation and taste, it was impeccable moreover the price was unbeatable for fresh, hearty, quality ingredients. Amazing food and service to mat of presentation and taste, it was impeccable moreover the price was unbeatable for fresh, hearty, quality ingredients. Amazing food and service to match.
A must try in Ella! We had the "Special Lamprais" 🤤 The waiters are very friendly and the food is so delicious! About 1 km from Ella Centre, easy to do a little walk 😉
Immaculate service. The food was excellent from the presentation to the flavour. Highly recommend the mint passion soda!
Amazing food with top tier service, flavour and presentation. As a Sri Lankan I can confidently recommend this place for its authentic flavour.
Beautiful location with great service and hearty authentic Sri Lankan food for good value. Would highly recommend to anyone visiting the area

Excellent hospitality with good quality Sri Lankan food in an authentic setting.
We thoroughly enjoyed the experience and will come again !
Great food, very kind stuff, great fresh juice and for good prices. Very nice place. Recomend this place.

They have really good prices! The local food there is soooo amazing! It was one od the best currys we had in sri lanka. The western food is nothing special but for the price quiet good I think. So all in all it was a...really nice dinber and the staff was very friendly and welcomi really nice dinber and the staff was very friendly and welcoming.
Location is good , food very tasty , and cafe very clean . Staff also good . I recommend to visitor visit this cafe and try to best food taste

After visiting the 9 arches bridge we found this little place. Really good food and fresh juices! Perfect to get some energy before walking up little Adam’s peek. Or after 😀 totally recommend this restaurant 👍🏻
We had a pleasant time here. Fascinating place. The food is very tasty. A good restaurant that we experienced during our trip to Sri Lanka. Love it. Recommend to everyone.

Amazing restaurant and even more amazing staff !!!
The food is soooo good and you will be greeted with such warmth.
Go try it out you will be pleased !
:)

It may not have the prime position...on the Main Street but the food was good enough to be the on the Main Street but the food was good enough to be there!

Excellent service ♥️ Tasty food 😍 We had the pleasure of eating cheese kottu perfectly prepared... we had 100% juice, In a quiet atmosphere, and friendly staff, 
we enjoyed our dinner fully. It's a gem in a busy Ella...I like to highly recommend this place.💕✨

We had the pleasure to eat Masala Dosa, perfectly prepared… we had a 100% juice , accompanying it (pure, very tasteful and no water added) . In a quiet atmosphere, we enjoyed our dinner fully. It’s a gem in a busy Ella…

This placed had the absolute most bland roti, I have recieved during my trip to Sri Lanka. Super friendly and nice location. The Dinner was perfect. Ate traditional Sri Lankian food with Kotu, Roti and Rice & Curry. Everything so delicious and the price was more than fair. We really liked it and can absolutely recommend it. Thanks a lot 🤗
Very good food, fast service. A very broad menu with a selection of  local, indian and western dishes. Reasonable prices. .

If you are looking for an authentic local food experience, this is the place to visit.  The food is delocious and tasty, you should also try their Fresh juices. We had quite a few but this ones are really outstanding. Excellent!

We had  cooking lesson with Thushanthi
She was amazing 
Tought us to cook with very simple methods 
It came out so tasty that I wanted to go back the next day again
Very recommended 
Do yourself a favour and go there!
Fantastic food. Best dosa I’ve ever had. Also a breath of fresh air from the other tourist traps in town. Highly recommend.

We attended the evening cooking class and had the best Sri Lankan experience! Our lovely teacher talked us through all the ingredients and fresh produce sourced from the vegetable store next door. First up we ground fresh coconut and learned how to make our own...coconut milk. We then prepared 9 vegetable curry dishes and delicious fragrant rice, finishing the night by sitting down and enjoying the meal we had just made. We are so glad we took the class, learning how to make the tasty dishes we have been trying during our trip around the country added another level of appreciation for the beautiful Sri Lankan cuisine. Highly recomme coconut milk. We then prepared 9 vegetable curry dishes and delicious fragrant rice, finishing the night by sitting down and enjoying the meal we had just made. We are so glad we took the class, learning how to make the tasty dishes we have been trying during our trip around the country added another level of appreciation for the beautiful Sri Lankan cuisine. Highly recommend!

Super friendly Stuff!

They ONLY care about the money. They don’t care about you.

Thank you guys, see you next ti in everything.
Thank you guys, see you next time.
Very nice food, good size portions, good music, and the service provided from Ivan was 5 star! He is helpful explaining the dishes and the city! I recommend the place when staying in Ella!

Delicious food for a good price, i am so full.  Very friendly service and i was able to make a music wish. Good sound system!
Great food, wifi available staff is very kind and friendly, the soups are so good, Prabath he was very helpful and friendly with us, I recommend this place
Thanks for warm welcome and delicious food.  Atmosphere is great and service is impeccable.  Special thanks to Theeban.
Excellent customer service from Tibben, so friendly and attentive. We had a great dinner that was reasonably priced. Would recommend if you're in the centre of Ella!

This place has good food, good service prices and view. It's a good spot to people watch, and just hang out. The staff is kind and informative, and the food is delightful as well. Can't go wrong with the veg rice and curry. 😊🇱🇰❤️
Low pressure good cheap food and nice staff. A lot of the other bars are fancier but what you see here is what you get, great staff great food
Very tasty food and also very cheap prices. Friendy staff and good location in the centre of Ella town. We would recommend that place and go there again.

Very good place for a quick dinner before going out for cocktails or night out. You have to eat here whilst in Ella! The rotti and kottu were excellent, we had the vegetable and cheese rotti and the chicken and vegetable kottu both had so much flavour, huge portion size and quickly served. Can’t fault it thank you!

Delicious and very reasonably priced food! Some of the best in Ella! The first time we came we had the seafood salad and the chicken kebab on a roti and the second time we had the prawn kottu and the chicken kebab with chips. Had lunch and dinner and dessert multiple times at this place while in Ella. Very friendly staff - Amila served us and he was very nice. The upstairs area is quiet and nice and the food is freshly made and generous. Nice spot. More reviews...@myra.recomme @myra.recommends

I spent a few hours here on the covered porch, enjoying the people-watching and the best chicken and cheese kottu roti I had in the whole country. Accompanied by pots of ginger tea and a mango lassi. Really yummy and the server was really cool.

Recommend the fresh made rotti with garlic cheese and vegetables. The rotti is made infront of you at the kitchen at the entrance. Delicious. We came back for this dish. Good local prices. Locals ate here also. Staff friendly, and food comes quick.

We’ve had dinner there 5 days in a row. They’re really kind, the food is really nice and also has a good price! 
We totally recommend the coconut rotti with honey! We’ve tried a lot in Sri Lanka and this one is the best!

Quite expensive by local standards. Carrot and ginger soup - no ginger and  very bland. Tiny bread roll but tasty. Strawberry milkshake which was supposed to include real strawberries. None apparent. Just strawberry ice cream. Waiter indifferent to complaint
The place is amazing, the decoration is wonderful, the food is delicious and the team is so friendly specialy Rasika who speak Spanish. I highly recommend this lovely place. Thank you so much
Nice fast service of Rasika; and good food (lots of options, also for vegans)  , open air seating under the roof, on the main street (expect it to be a bit laud)

We were warmly received by Vidal who rushed to find us a nice table on the upper terrace despite the full occupancy. Food was great, beer was awesome and mostly Vidal our waiter gave us an extraordinary service. Will go there again certainly.
The food is really good and the service is nice. Rasika did a great job in serving drinks and food. We can recommend this place.
Top place for a feed in Ella. Great food, great atmosphere and great service - especially Vidal!  Highly recommended.  You”ll want the top floor tables overlooking the street - book ahead.

The cooking class is fantastic! You learn how to make coconut milk, 6 curries, roti, fried bananas, Papadam, rice,... Very well organised and passionate staff. Best cooking class I'v ever been to!

Beyond Nomad Cafe is a delight for food and drink lovers. Their pizzas, with crispy crusts and flavorful toppings, redefine deliciousness. The cocktail menu is equally impressive and diverse. Nomad Cafe was a great place for us to meet up with friends whilst in Ella. The staff were very friendly, the cocktails were delicious and there is a pool table! A great spot to go to, although a little hard to find in the...da dark.
Pizza was great, good music, good staff, good vibes. We enjoyed our time in this cozy place, away from all the busyness of Ella. Definitely looking forward to come back soon.More

Very cosy bar, super friendly staff, nice atmosphere away from Main Street. Definitely worth the detour! Great pizza and nice music, which they will change if you ask them too. This place deserves more guests!More
